channel.title: automation on The hungarian man who went to Malta

item.title: Github actions from zero to this blog
item.description: I wanted to try Github actions since it got announced. Finally I had it on my foreseeable list when I started this blog, and lately, I did it. 👏 🎉🎆 I got to a working pipeline in 25 tries, lets go through each step how it improved piece by piece. I started to work on it at night, thinking it would not take long. (hehe, famous last words). After around 20 failed runs, I went to sleep.
